description:
PyData London 2016

Bokeh is an Interactive visualization library that targets modern web browsers for presentation. It provides elegant, concise construction of basic exploratory and advanced custom graphics, but can also be used to develop sophisticated dashboards and data applications.

0:00
- 0:05 Introduction and Setup
0:05
- 0:20 Review and Practice with Bokeh Basics
0:20
- 0:40 Widgets, Interactions and Streaming in the Notebook
0:40
- 1:05 Handling Larger Data Sets with Bokeh and Datashader
1:05
- 1:30 Building Bokeh Applications
title: Bokeh for Data Applications and Visualization
